title: Postcard Design Project
content:
I am working on a project for an information design class. For the project, we are to gather some data and design a positive piece that exhibits our findings.

For my project, I’ve chosen postcards! I am really excited about the project. In order to gather some data, I’ve built a website. Check it out at:

[www.onepostcard.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090517053043/http:/www.onepostcard.com/ "www.onepostcard.com")

If everyone would be so kind as to take the survey and to upload some postcards.

Thanks!
author: macursus

comments.content: You might also consider starting a group on Flickr.
I really like the design of the site. Good luck!
